# Seasides 2026 - Cybersecurity Conference

> The India's Most Loved FREE Cybersecurity Conference.

## Summary

Seasides 2026 is a 3-day cybersecurity conference taking place at the International Centre Goa, India, from February 19-21, 2026. The event features technical training sessions, workshops, keynotes, and village activities (AI, Blockchain, Hardware). It is a community-driven, free-to-attend event focused on knowledge sharing and networking in the infosec domain.

## Key Information

- **Dates**: February 19-21, 2026
- **Location**: International Centre Goa, India
- **Website**: https://www.seasides.net
- **Cost**: Free (Invite Only / Registration Required)
- **Organizer**: Seasides Social Welfare Foundation

## Socials

- **Twitter/X**: [@SeasidesInfo](https://twitter.com/SeasidesInfo)
- **LinkedIn**: [Seasides Info](https://www.linkedin.com/company/seasides-info/)
- **Instagram**: [@seasides_info](https://www.instagram.com/seasides_info/)
- **YouTube**: [@SeasidesInfo](https://www.youtube.com/@SeasidesInfo)

## Content

### Speakers
List of featured speakers and trainers:
- [Speakers List](https://www.seasides.net/speakers)

### Schedule
Detailed agenda including trainings and workshops:
- [Full Schedule](https://www.seasides.net/schedule)

### Villages
- [AI Village](https://www.seasides.net/ai-village) - Focus on AI Security, LLMs, Deepfakes.
- [Blockchain Village](https://www.seasides.net/blockchain-village) - Focus on Web3 Security, Smart Contracts.
- [Hardware Village](https://www.seasides.net/hardware-village) - Focus on IoT, Firmware, Hardware Hacking.

## Top Topics
- Software Supply Chain Security
- AI & LLM Security (Red Teaming, Prompt Injection)
- Cloud Security (AWS, EKS, Kubernetes)
- Web Application Security
- Android Application Security
- Firmware Security
- Social Engineering
- Threat Hunting & Sigma Rules

## Sponsors
Supported by leading organizations in cybersecurity.
- [Sponsors Page](https://www.seasides.net/sponsors)
